title: Dazzling Diamond-Accented Gold Chain - Modern Kantha
materials: 22K Yellow Gold (9.430 grams). Round Brilliant Cut Diamonds (2.96 carats
features: A finely crafted gold chain with evenly spaced diamond-studded spherical accents. The spheres are paved with brilliant-cut diamonds, creating a sparkling contrast against the warm gold. Features a modern design with delicate chain links for comfortable wear. Hyderabadi polish for a lasting shine.
occasions: and as a subtle statement piece for modern celebrations. Can be styled with both traditional and contemporary attire.
description: This chain offers a unique blend of classic gold craftsmanship with modern diamond accents. Its durable construction and timeless design ensure it will be a cherished addition to your jewelry collection. Makes a stunning gift for any special occasion, showcasing both luxury and refined taste.
